unnormalised: Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Virality Trends
normalised: social media and influencer marketing: virality trends

unnormalised: Hey fam! What's trending hotter than chai on a rainy Mumbai day? Virality, obviously! But what makes content go "Om Shanti Om" viral these days? It's not just catchy tunes anymore.
normalised: hey fam! what's trending hotter than chai on a rainy mumbai day? virality, obviously! but what makes content go "om shanti om" viral these days? it's not just catchy tunes anymore.

unnormalised: Experts at IIM Ahmedabad are suggesting a shift. Authenticity is KEY. Forget perfectly curated feeds, Gen Z wants real. Think raw, unfiltered content that resonates, like that hilarious reel of your aunty trying a new filter.
normalised: experts at I I M ahmedabad are suggesting a shift. authenticity is key. forget perfectly curated feeds, gen Z wants real. think raw, unfiltered content that resonates, like that hilarious reel of your aunty trying a new filter.

unnormalised: The latest trends also point towards hyper-local content. Memes referencing specific areas in Delhi or inside jokes from engineering college life (IIT Delhi, anyone?) are killing it.
normalised: the latest trends also point towards hyper-local content. memes referencing specific areas in delhi or inside jokes from engineering college life (I I T delhi, anyone?) are killing it.

unnormalised: Remember that "Rasode mein kaun tha?" clip? Still gets a laugh, right? That's because it tapped into Indian family dynamics.
normalised: remember that "rasode mein kaun tha?" clip? still gets a laugh, right? that's because it tapped into indian family dynamics.

unnormalised: So, creators, ditch the generic stuff. Embrace your quirks, your locality, and that shared cultural experience.
normalised: so, creators, ditch the generic stuff. embrace your quirks, your locality, and that shared cultural experience.

unnormalised: And remember, one viral hit can turn you into the next Bhuvan Bam overnight. But stay grounded, guys! Don't let the internet fame get to your head. Just keep creating and keep it real!
normalised: and remember, one viral hit can turn you into the next bhuvan bam overnight. but stay grounded, guys! don't let the internet fame get to your head. just keep creating and keep it real!
